description: Number of 5th order maximal independent sets in path graph.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. Yanco and A. Bagchi, ``K-th order maximal independent sets in path and cycle graphs,'' J. Graph Theory, submitted, 1994.
formula: Apparently a(n)= +a(n-2) +a(n-7) with g.f. -x*(1+2*x+x^3+x^5+x^6)/(-1+x^2+x^7). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 30 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
